name: semantic-change-analysis
description: Semantic shift visualization using word embeddings

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && uv sync
scripts.start: cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test: cd frontend && pnpm test && cd ../backend && uv run pytest
scripts.format: cd frontend && pnpm format && cd ../backend && uv run black . && uv run isort .
scripts.lint: cd frontend && pnpm lint && cd ../backend && uv run flake8 .
